other_tests.findings: Cove-type ST elevations and a right bundle branch block in precordial leads V1 and V2, consistent with the Brugada syndrome pattern.
other_tests.changes_over_time: 48 hours after the Brugada pattern was noted, the electrocardiogram normalized.

other_tests.findings: Mildly dilated left atrium, normal regional left ventricular wall motion, left ventricular ejection fraction of more than 55%, and trivial mitral regurgitation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Compared with the patientâ€™s preoperative study, the echocardiogram was unchanged.
